instructions: Download the Sonos app to a phone, tablet, or computer. The Sonos app is available from Google Play or Amazon (Android) and from Apple App Store (iOS). Open the Sonos app and tap either Setup New System or Add Speakers. If given a choice between Standard or Boost setup, select Standard . There may be situations where a Boost setup is required. When you start setup , the app will remind you to plug the Sonos into a power source , then prompt you to choose the speaker or device. You will be prompted to check for a flashing green light. Once confirmed, press the designated buttons on your Sonos device. Wait for confirmation that the speaker has been added to your setup. You'll be prompted to add another speaker, but if you don't need to, select Not Now and a final Setup Complete page will be displayed. Select Done in the top-right corner. Sonos is ready to play music via the Sonos App.
